overview: Azouz (Mohamed Sobhy) is a planning employee who lives alone in an apartment in the neighborhood of Zamalek. He is single and isolated from his neighbors. He has addressed 7 years to Suhair (Rawiya Saleh) and is distinguished by his inability to make a decision. The wrong way to a call between al-Hanash (Mahmoud al-Qalawi) and the teacher Sarsa to plan the murder of his neighbor Muhammad Abd al-Rahman (Naji Saad).
title: El Mahzooz
